name: TransitStatus
0:
”Alexa, ask Transit status for upcoming 535”
”Alexa, ask Transit status for next 535”
”Alexa, ask Transit status about next 535”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: transit status
des:
Retrieve scheduled arrival information for buses closer to your location so you can get out in time. If this turns out to be useful, I will add more improvements.

Currently supported cities are Atlanta, Rogue Valley, Seattle/Tacoma/Puget Sound, San Diego, Tampa Bay, Washington D.C. and York region (Canada).

Pulls information using Open-source OneBusAway REST APIs.
